Name: Steel Hellkite
Text: Flying\n{2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\n{X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.

Name: Memoricide
Text: Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

Name: Wurmcoil Engine
Text: Deathtouch, lifelink\nWhen Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.
